scripts.start: npm run compile_coffee & nodemon server.coffee -- fullscreen=false
scripts.start_fullscreen: npm run compile_coffee & node server.coffee -- fullscreen=true
scripts.pm2_start_prod: pm2 delete MIDIAINDOOR; pm2 start server.js --name=MIDIAINDOOR
scripts.git_pull_prod: git checkout package-lock.json; git checkout package.json; git checkout schema.json; git pull; npm install; npm update sc-node-tools;
scripts.deploy: npm run git_pull_prod; npm run apagar_arquivos_antigos; pm2 restart MIDIAINDOOR
